name: Baby First Tea Party
description:
Baby First Tea Party summer Vacation Special Game...
Kids Want to Enjoy their summer vacation.
They have their plans for vacation & one of them is TEA Party.
Baby Liza need your help for Tea party Preparation,Shopping & Her makeover + Dress up.
- Room Decoration
- Room Decoration
- Kids Makeover
- Go for Shopping
- Dress up
- Food Serving
- Enjoy TEA Party with Friends.
